channel.title: EPPMS Wiki on EPPMS
channel.description: Recent content in EPPMS Wiki on EPPMS

item.title: Booking for an Event
item.description: Guide Visit a department homepage, or visit the event page directly. In the event page, look for the ticket section Select number of tickets to be reserved and click the “REGISTER” button. Fill in the details for the bookie (the person performing the booking). If the bookie and the attendee is the same, click the “COPY THESE DETAILS TO ALL TICKET HOLDER” button, else, fill up the details of the attendee.

item.title: Viewing a Department Homepage
item.description: Guide Visit the demo main landing page website at https://eppms.vicuna.me. Or the designated homepage that you installed this system. View all the departments from the department section. Visit a department by clicking the “URL” button from the department card. You should be able to see the department homepage.

item.title: Viewing the System Homepage
item.description: Guide Visit the demo main landing page website at https://eppms.vicuna.me. Or the designated homepage that you installed this system. View the latest events from the slider. View all the departments from the department section. Visit a department by clicking the “URL” button from the department card. /wiki

item.title: Downloading an Event Poster
item.description: Pre-requisites A user account who has super-administrator, an administrator or an author of a department. Guide Login to the demo site, for more details visit Logging in to system. Click the “Events” link from the menu. Select an event to be edited by using the search input box or browsing the list. Click the pencil icon in the action column of the selected event

item.title: Generating an Event Poster by Uploading an Existing Media
item.description: Pre-requisites A user account who has super-administrator, an administrator or an author of a department. Guide Login to the demo site, for more details visit Logging in to system. Click the “Events” link from the menu. Select an event to be edited by using the search input box or browsing the list. Click the pencil icon in the action column of the selected event

item.title: Generating an Event Poster From a Template
item.description: Pre-requisites A user account who has super-administrator, an administrator or an author of a department. Guide Login to the demo site, for more details visit Logging in to system. Click the “Events” link from the menu. Select an event to be edited by using the search input box or browsing the list. Click the pencil icon in the action column of the selected event

item.title: Create a Ticket for an Event
item.description: Pre-requisites A user account who has super-administrator, an administrator or an author of a department. Guide Login to the demo site, for more details visit Logging in to system. Click the “Events” link from the menu. Select an event to be edited by using the search input box or browsing the list. Click the pencil icon in the action column of the selected event

item.title: Create an Event
item.description: Pre-requisites A user account who has super-administrator, an administrator or an author of a department. Guide Login to the demo site, for more details visit Logging in to system. Click the “Events” link from the menu. Click the “+EVENT” button. Define the following: Department: available only to super administrator Title: the title of the event Synopsis: the synopsis of the event Excerpt: the excerpt of the event Start date: start date of the event Start time of the event End date: end date of the event End time: end time of the event Social media toggles Facebook: allow event to be shared on Facebook Twitter: allow event to be shared on Twitter Email: share event by Email Whatsapp: allow event to be shared on Whatsapp LinkedIn: allow event to be shared via LinkedIn Select venue.

item.title: Create a Speaker
item.description: Pre-requisites A user account who has super-administrator, an administrator and an author of a department. Guide Login to the demo site, for more details visit Logging in to system. Click the “Speakers” link from the menu. Click the +SPEAKER button. Define these items Name: full name of the speaker Photo: a JPG, PNG or BMP file type, with dimensions of at least 190px X 240px.

item.title: Create a Template
item.description: Pre-requisites A user account who has super-administrator or is an administrator of a department. Test Materials Download a sample template from thes pages Create template by uploading HTML, CSS and image files: https://github.com/argelsences/eppms-templates/raw/main/template1.zip Create template by HTML, CSS source codes and uploading image files: https://github.com/argelsences/eppms-templates/raw/main/template2.zip Guide Create a template by uploading HTML, CSS and image files Login to the demo site, for more details visit Logging in to system.

item.title: Create a User Account
item.description: Pre-requisites A user account who has super-administrator or is an administrator of a department. Guide Login to the demo site, for more details visit Logging in to system Click the “User” link from the menu. Fill out the form: Name: full name of ththe user Email: email address of the user Department: the department where the user belongs Logo: logo of the department in jpg, png or bmp format Designation: the designation of the user Role: role of the user in the system Password: minimum of 14 alphanumeric characters Click “Save” button.

item.title: Create a Department
item.description: Pre-requisites A user account who has super-administrator access to the system. Guide Login to the demo site, for more details visit Logging in to system Click the “Department” link from the menu. Fill out the form: Name: the department name Email: the department email Tel #: telephone number of the department Logo: logo of the department in jpg, png or bmp format About: description of the department Department URI: a unique URI representing the department Facebook URL: the Facebook URL of the department Instagram URL: the Instragram URL of the department Page header color: use the color picker Page background color: use the color picker Page text color: use the color picker Google Analytics ID: the Google Analytics code only Google Tag Manager ID: the Google Tag Manager code only Click Save button.

item.title: Logging in to System
item.description: Guide Visit the demo login site at https://eppms.vicuna.me/web-admin Input your username and password (the administrator may have provided you with login details). Click “Let’s Go” button. Go back to guides
